title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Join our cloud engineering team to build scalable solutions for Fortune 500 clients.
aboutRole: We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our cloud engineering team. You will be responsible for designing and building scalable cloud-based solutions for our Fortune 500 clients. This is a high-impact role where you will work closely with architects and product managers to deliver world-class enterprise SaaS platforms.
companyDescription: Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in more than 50 countries to navigate their digital transformation.
responsibilities: Design and develop cloud-native applications using AWS and Azure
Build and maintain microservices architecture for enterprise clients
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement technical solutions
Mentor junior engineers and conduct code reviews
Optimize application performance and scalability
Participate in architectural decisions and contribute to the technical roadmap
requirements: 5+ years of professional experience in software development
Strong proficiency in Java, Python, or Node.js
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
Deep understanding of microservices architecture and containerization
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
benefits: Health insurance for you and your family

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product strategy for our e-commerce platform and drive innovation.
aboutRole: Join Flipkart as a Product Manager and shape the future of e-commerce in India. You will own end-to-end product development for key features that impact millions of users daily. This role requires strong analytical skills, customer empathy, and the ability to collaborate with engineering, design, and business teams.
companyDescription: Flipkart is India's leading e-commerce marketplace with over 350 million registered users. We are committed to making commerce accessible and affordable for everyone.
responsibilities: Define product vision and roadmap for key e-commerce features
Conduct user research and analyze data to identify opportunities
Work closely with engineering and design teams to deliver exceptional products
Define and track key product metrics and KPIs
Prioritize features based on impact and effort
Present product updates to leadership and stakeholders
requirements: 4+ years of product management experience, preferably in e-commerce or consumer tech
Strong analytical skills with experience in SQL and data analysis tools
Proven track record of launching successful products
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
Deep understanding of user-centered design principles
MBA or equivalent experience preferred

title: Data Scientist
description: Build ML models to optimize ride pricing and demand forecasting.
aboutRole: As a Data Scientist at Ola, you will work on cutting-edge machine learning problems that directly impact millions of riders and drivers. You will build models for dynamic pricing, demand forecasting, and route optimization that power India's largest ride-hailing platform.
companyDescription: Ola is India's largest mobility platform and one of the world's largest ride-hailing companies, serving 250+ cities across India, Australia, New Zealand, and the UK.
responsibilities: Develop and deploy machine learning models for pricing optimization
Build demand forecasting models to improve driver-rider matching
Analyze large datasets to uncover insights and opportunities
Collaborate with product and engineering teams to productionize models
Monitor model performance and iterate based on real-world feedback
Present findings and recommendations to leadership
requirements: Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
3+ years of experience in data science or machine learning
Strong programming skills in Python and experience with ML frameworks
Experience with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
Solid understanding of statistical modeling and A/B testing
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

title: Frontend Developer
description: Build beautiful user interfaces for India's leading payments platform.
aboutRole: Join Paytm's frontend engineering team to build delightful user experiences for millions of users. You will work on our web and mobile web platforms, implementing pixel-perfect designs and ensuring optimal performance across devices.
companyDescription: Paytm is India's leading digital payments and financial services company, serving over 350 million users with payment, banking, and commerce solutions.
responsibilities: Develop responsive web applications using React and TypeScript
Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs
Optimize application performance and load times
Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices
Work with backend teams to integrate APIs
requirements: 1-3 years of experience in frontend development
Strong proficiency in React, JavaScript, and TypeScript
Experience with responsive design and CSS frameworks
Understanding of web performance optimization
Familiarity with Git and modern development workflows
Good communication skills and team player

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines for our food delivery platform.
aboutRole: As a DevOps Engineer at Zomato, you will be responsible for building and maintaining the infrastructure that powers India's largest food delivery platform. You will work on automation, monitoring, and ensuring high availability for millions of daily orders.
companyDescription: Zomato is India's leading food delivery and restaurant discovery platform, serving 25+ countries and processing millions of orders daily.
responsibilities: Design and maintain scalable cloud infrastructure on AWS
Build and optimize CI/CD pipelines for rapid deployments
Implement monitoring and alerting systems
Automate infrastructure provisioning using Terraform
Ensure system reliability and uptime
Collaborate with development teams to improve deployment processes
requirements: 3+ years of experience in DevOps or Site Reliability Engineering
Strong experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Proficiency with AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda)
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Knowledge of monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK)
Scripting skills in Python, Bash, or similar

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create delightful experiences for our premium credit card users.
aboutRole: Join CRED as a UI/UX Designer and craft beautiful, intuitive experiences for India's most creditworthy users. You will work on our mobile app, web platform, and new product initiatives, pushing the boundaries of design excellence.
companyDescription: CRED is a members-only platform that rewards creditworthy individuals for making timely credit card payments. We are known for our distinctive design and premium user experience.
responsibilities: Design end-to-end user experiences for mobile and web
Create high-fidelity mockups and interactive prototypes
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with product and engineering teams
Maintain and evolve the design system
Present design concepts to stakeholders
requirements: 4+ years of experience in UI/UX design
Strong portfolio showcasing mobile app design
Expertise in Figma, Sketch, or similar tools
Understanding of motion design and micro-interactions
Experience with design systems
Excellent visual design skills

title: Backend Developer
description: Build high-performance APIs and microservices for our food delivery platform.
aboutRole: Join Swiggy's backend engineering team to build robust, scalable APIs that power millions of food deliveries. You will work on microservices architecture, database optimization, and real-time systems.
companyDescription: Swiggy is India's leading on-demand delivery platform, bringing food, groceries, and more to millions of customers across 500+ cities.
responsibilities: Develop RESTful APIs using Java and Spring Boot
Design and optimize database schemas
Implement caching strategies for improved performance
Build event-driven systems using Kafka
Write unit and integration tests
Participate in on-call rotation
requirements: 1-3 years of backend development experience
Strong knowledge of Java and Spring framework
Experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Understanding of microservices architecture
Familiarity with caching and message queues
Good problem-solving skills

title: Tech Lead
description: Lead engineering teams building India's largest digital payments platform.
aboutRole: As a Tech Lead at PhonePe, you will lead a team of talented engineers building critical payment infrastructure. You will drive technical excellence, mentor team members, and make key architectural decisions for systems processing millions of transactions daily.
companyDescription: PhonePe is India's leading digital payments platform with over 450 million registered users and presence across 99% of PIN codes in India.
responsibilities: Lead and mentor a team of 8-10 engineers
Drive architectural decisions and technical strategy
Design highly scalable and fault-tolerant systems
Conduct technical reviews and ensure code quality
Collaborate with product and business teams
Foster a culture of innovation and excellence
requirements: 8+ years of software engineering experience
3+ years in a technical leadership role
Deep expertise in distributed systems and microservices
Strong programming skills in Java or similar languages
Experience with high-scale payment or fintech systems
Excellent leadership and communication skills
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science
